title: Federal Reserve Forward Guidance: Rate Path Analysis Q3 2024
summary: A high-specificity analysis of Fed forward guidance signals drawn from official FOMC transcripts, economic data releases, and independent econometric models.

EVID.rationale: Primary sources: FOMC minutes, BLS releases, Fed H.15.

MECH.rationale: Transmission mechanism traced through Taylor Rule model.

INC.rationale: Fed member incentive constraints documented by mandate.

RISK.rationale: Tail risk scenarios quantified via probability-weighted paths.

SPEC.rationale: Claim-level specificity high; date-stamped data throughout.

claims.text: FOMC June 2024 minutes indicate median projection of 1 cut in 2024 (dot plot median: 5.125%).
CPI YoY fell to 3.0% in June 2024 per BLS release dated July 11 2024.
PCE core (Fed's preferred gauge) printed 2.6% for May 2024 per BEA.
CME FedWatch showed 72% probability of September cut as of July 15 2024.
Goldman Sachs macro model forecasts 2 cuts in 2024 with 68% confidence.
